reviews.text: Love how the the Staff at the station always welcome you and a 5 big boards to show you the time to train will arrive nice quick services to London or Watford nice and warm and seats to sit to wait for London overground trains
Great to get to London or Watford

rah i dunno where to begin tbh, this station is proper mad cos the platform is in middle rather than two on each side is it not? there is also a bangin chicken shop outside where the pigeon is peng af! bossman will set me the extra wing when using the station because im bare loyal.  the security guard is nice, he chats to you when you look like you're bored waiting for the train. train should be more often tho innit, waiting 20 minutes is bare long.

safe lads

reviews.author_name: London Flareon Tokyo Ebisu - Swanslade 恵比寿-スワンズレイド
reviews.text: Carpenders Park is located in the South Oxhey section of Watford, the station is only served by the Overground, Carpenders Park is a decent station, it's used quite often during peak hours, please remember this station isn't served by West Midlands Trains.

Better than most quiet stations on the basis that it has shelter, a ticket office and step free access via a long ramp. Ticket barriers are in situ here and the station see trains every 20 mins or so. It can be a good spot for trainspotters due to the clear view of the mainline. I don't like how it's in zone 7 however.
